author: Justine Coleman
title: Michigan governor responds to Meghan McCain: Buying child car seats not banned
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) on Sunday clarified that the state's "Stay Home, Stay Safe" order doesn't ban the sale of child car seats after "The View" co-host Meghan McCain berated her for the supposed...
